mapper.select: SELECT topic_id FROM attentiontopic WHERE user_account = #{userAccount}

SELECT a.id as attid, a.topic_date, t.topic_name, t.topic_barnum, t.topic_attentionnum, t.topic_slogan, t.topic_image, t.id FROM attentiontopic a left join topic t on a.topic_id = t.id WHERE a.user_account = #{userAccount} and t.topic_name like concat('%',(#{search}),'%') and a.id > #{id} ORDER BY topic_date DESC
mapper.insert: insert into attentiontopic (user_account, topic_id, topic_name, topic_date) select #{userAccount}, #{topicId}, #{topicName}, #{topicDate} from DUAL where not EXISTS(select id from attentiontopic where user_account = #{userAccount} and topic_id = #{topicId})
